name: Tower defense (AlexXin)
description:
This is a tower defense game based on Brackeys' youtube tutorial. 

I add two additional game mechanics;

1: In addition to the enemy attack unit, the enemy also have the support turret. For now, there are three turrets, Gaslin turret which will attack the player's soldier, power turret which reduces the available node for the player, and shield projectors which will provide shields to the enemy attack unit.

2: between the enemy attack round, the player could send out soldiers to destroy the enemy turret. If the enemy power turret is destroyed, the player will have a more available node to build the turret.
